product_name: Mount Diablo State Park Trail Map - 6th Edition
long_description: The sixth edition Mount Diablo State Park Trail Map is a "must have" for park users, from the casual visitor looking for a picnic spot to the serious hiker who wants to explore less visited corners. Newly updated map is printed in full color on waterproof, tear-resistant paper to last through many trips and seasons. Topographic map clearly shows all 187 miles of hiking trails, along with suitability for bikes and horses, elevations and UTM GPS grids. Back of the map provides general park information, guidelines, history, natural environment, points of interest, favorite hikes and notes for campers and picnickers. Folded map measures 9 x 4 in.; unfolds to 35.5 x 26.5 in. Published by Mount Diablo Interpretive Association; copyright 2009.
short_description: The sixth edition Mount Diablo State Park Trail Map is a "must have" for park users, from the casual visitor looking for a picnic spot to the serious hiker who wants to explore less visited corners.
